subject: Time frame for HS pro shifter
description_text:
Hey I'm looking at ordering a HS Pro Shifter from you guys but was
wondering how long it'd take to arrive before I buy it, I live in Western
Australia, post code 6171, I'd be keen on the express shipping but want to
know if it's come before the end of this month.

Kind regards,

Ronan McIsaac

conversations.body_text: Hi R J McIsaac,  The first batch has already been shipped. The second batch may require a few more days for assembly. We recommend waiting a few days, or not selecting expedited shipping at this time.

Also another question, does the pedal haptic feedback mount onto Moza SR-P
lite pedals?

On Wed, 7 Jan 2026, 5:50 pm support@simsonn.com,
Hi R J McIsaac,  At the moment, we do not have a compatible mounting bracket. You may need to look online for a suitable 3D mount file and print it yourself.

?

R J reacted via Gmail
<https://www.google.com/gmail/about/?utm_source=gmail-in-product&utm_medium=et&utm_campaign=emojireactionemail#app>

On Wed, 7 Jan 2026, 6:22 pm support@simsonn.com,
